comments:
When I first start up Eclipse, I'm not able to build any of my ant targets. I get the unhelpful error:

Ant internal error occurred during: "Launching".

So, I go into Preferences->Ant and click on the Runtime option and I get another unhelpful error:

The currently displayed page contains invalid values.

If I hit ok to exit the preferences dialog and then go back into Preferences->Ant->Runtime and click restore defaults, then things start to work again and I can build my projects, but these changes do not last across restarts of Eclipse so that means I have to repeat these steps every time.

I have tried removing my workspace/.metadata folder and starting from scratch. I have upgraded to Eclipse 3.1.2. Neither of these solve the problem.

Help!

Below is what I see in .metadata/.log...

Thank you for the bug report.
A problem with our implementation on the Mac.
Fixed in the 3.2 stream via the duplicate bug report.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 105677 ***
